languages.text: "Почему ты не рассказала преподобному Иеронимусу о своей догадке? Он наверняка помог бы с поиском корабля и мощей святой".
"Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."
languages.original_text: "Почему ты не рассказала преподобному Иеронимусу о своей догадке? Он наверняка помог бы с поиском корабля и мощей святой".

traits.locale_text: "Why did you keep your guess from Hieronimus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the remains of a saint."
"Why did you keep your guess from Hieronimus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the remains of a saint."
"Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."
"Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."
"Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."

languages.text: “你当时为什么没有把你的推测告诉希罗尼穆斯牧师？如果你开口，他肯定会帮你寻找那艘飞船与圣人的遗物。”
languages.original_text: "Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."

traits.locale_text: “你当时为什么没有把你的推测告诉希罗尼穆斯牧师？如果你开口，他肯定会帮你寻找那艘飞船与圣人的遗物。”

languages.text: «¿Por qué ocultó su sospecha al reverendo Hieronymus? Seguro que podría haberla ayudado a buscar la nave y los restos de la santa».
languages.original_text: "Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué ocultó su sospecha al reverendo Hieronymus? Seguro que podría haberla ayudado a buscar la nave y los restos de la santa».

languages.text: 「なぜヒエロニムス司祭にその推測を隠していたのだ？彼であればきっと、船と聖者の遺物の捜索を手伝ってくれただろう」
languages.original_text: "Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜヒエロニムス司祭にその推測を隠していたのだ？彼であればきっと、船と聖者の遺物の捜索を手伝ってくれただろう」

languages.text: "Warum habt Ihr Euer Vorhaben vor Reverend Hieronymus verborgen? Er hätte Euch doch bestimmt helfen können, das Schiff und die Überreste der Heiligen zu finden."
languages.original_text: "Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."

traits.locale_text: "Warum habt Ihr Euer Vorhaben vor Reverend Hieronymus verborgen? Er hätte Euch doch bestimmt helfen können, das Schiff und die Überreste der Heiligen zu finden."

languages.text: « Pourquoi avez-vous caché votre hypothèse au révérend Hiéronymus ? Il aurait certainement pu vous aider à chercher le vaisseau et la dépouille de la sainte. »
languages.original_text: "Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi avez-vous caché votre hypothèse au révérend Hiéronymus ? Il aurait certainement pu vous aider à chercher le vaisseau et la dépouille de la sainte. »

languages.text: "Varsayımını neden Muhterem Hieronymus'la paylaşmadın? Gemiyi ve azizenin kalıntılarını ararken desteğini senden esirgemezdi."
languages.original_text: "Why did you keep your supposition from Reverend Hieronymus? Surely he could have helped you with the search for the ship and the saint's remains."

traits.locale_text: "Varsayımını neden Muhterem Hieronymus'la paylaşmadın? Gemiyi ve azizenin kalıntılarını ararken desteğini senden esirgemezdi."
